DIUser.h

– loginUsingTraditionalWithEmail:password:

This function registers the new user using traditional mechanism of email and password combination.

- (void)loginUsingTraditionalWithEmail:(nonnull NSString *)emailAddress password:(nonnull NSString *)password

Parameters

emailAddress

The email address of the user
password

The password of the user

Discussion

This function registers the new user using traditional mechanism of email and password combination.

Requires that the flow name and Capture app ID be configured.

Registers a new user.

Parameters

The email address of the user
name

receiveMarketingEmails
